Alternate Contact: Wendy Serko, Recreation Program Assistant; Phone: 250.469.8954; Email: wserko@kelowna.ca
Service Details: - Helps families with a financial need enroll their kids in recreational activities through the Canadian Tire Foundation- Helps pay for organized activities such as hockey, dancing, soccer, swimming, baseball, karate, ballet, gymnastics, and skating, and more * through participation in these programs, children develop important life skills, self-esteem and confidence through teamwork
Eligibility: Ages: 4 year(s) - 18 year(s)- For physical activities only- Each child is allowed one activity or program per season: Jan-Jun  OR  Jul-Dec
Address & Map: 1800 Parkinson WayKelowna, BC     V1Y 4P9View MapQuest Map
Accessibility: Accessible by public transit, access friendly facility, wheel chair accessible, disabled parking, automatic doors, access friendly washrooms, hydraulic pool lift for main pool, ramp entry to small pool, access friendly fitness centre
Former Name: Recreation, Parks and Cultural Services, Active Communities
